transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. I Mangesh ji baat kar rahe prasanna enterprises se?
Customer: Haan bol raha hun.
Executive: Sir main Taruna baat kar rahi hun IndiaMART head office se actually sir aapka na ek ye baat hui thi aapke account manager se aapka discussion hua tha aapne na not satisfied mark kiya tha isme services ke regarding kya issue aa raha tha sir services mein koi problem aa raha tha services theek nahi chal rahi thi kyunki sir se meri baat hui thi to sir bol rahe the ki good buyleads nahi aa raha hai thoda achcha.
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Aap hi se baat hui thi kya kal sir meri?
Customer: Nahi nahi Aniket se baat hui hai.
Executive: Aniket jo primary number pe hai haan unka number abhi switch off ja raha hai sir. To sir wo good buyleads nahi aa raha tha sir bol rahe the kal unhone bola theek hai main use karta hun uske baad unhone na call kaat diya maine unko dobara call kiya tha ye bolne ke liye ki sir aapka ek ticket open hua hai to aapko abhi isko main ticket ko close kar deti hun yahan se baki buylead abhi aapko ek mahina bhi nahi hua sir abhi tak abhi to isi mahine aapne services liya hai abhi to aap uses kar rahe hain aap pehle use kariye barabar consume kariye buylead dekhiye kaisa response aa raha hai buylead mein koi dikkat hai to aap directly mujhe bataiye ki buylead mein kuch aisa aa raha hai to fir uske according fir hum usme baat kar lete hain kaam kar lete hain to sir ne bola tha theek hai ab main use karta hun bola tha unhone fir unhone phone kaat diya to main unko unse ticket closer bhi lena tha but baat ho nahi pai unse aaj unka number bhi switch off hai to aap se isiliye main wo bol rahi thi ki sir ticket open hui hai to ek main usko close kar deti hun yahan se aap ek bar sir usme matlab aapke pass ek mail aayega registered mail id pe hamare liye satisfied ka right hamare liye wo dal dijiyega.
Customer: Nahi nahi main ye kya bol raha hun wo review kisne manga tha?
Executive: Review matlab?
Customer: Review kisne manga tha ki usne negative diya aapko?
Executive: Sir review aapke jo account manager hote hain na.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Smrita ne aap se baat ki hogi to wo message pe aur us pe jata hai mail vagaira pe message pe aapke jata hai ki sir aap IndiaMART ki service se satisfied hai not satisfied to unhone.
Customer: Aapne bina service liye itni jaldi kaiko mang liya review aapki wait karo na hame business.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir main wo samajhti hun wo sir wo review services ka nahi wo aapka feedback ka hota hai.
Customer: Bina business diye kya review dena hai 10 ke 10 dekhte baad mein aapke koi response nahi hai ek bhi order nahi hai abhi tak 100 200 300 order.
Executive: Sorry to sir service start hui hai sir main aapko feedback ki baat kar rahi hun review ki baat nahi kar rahi hun wo feedback diya tha aapne.
Customer: Business dijiye hame pehle business dijiye.
Executive: Haan haan sir wo to aayega wo feedback to har mahine aata hai but unhone abhi kya kar diya tha wo call pe baat hui thi na.
Customer: Har mahine negative denge koi issue nahi hai jab tak business hota nahi har mahine negative denge.
Executive: Sir ab aise to aap bhi pata hai Mangesh ji abhi panch din service use karte hi sir seedha sa aapko kaam to aapko bhi nahi aayega na ye to aapko bhi pata hai time lagta hai na process mein aisa to hai nahi sir ki IndiaMART abhi.
Customer: Aap panch din se hi ye le lo.
Executive: Haan bilkul sir dekho mere ko koi problem nahi hai koi dikkat hai.
Customer: Madam.
Executive: Sir bilkul koi problem nahi hai wo call ka feedback hota hai ki call pe aapko sari cheeze sir jo bhi cheeze hain haan call pe sari cheeze jo samjhai jaye jo theek theek hai aapko kuch dikkat hai nahi hai aap bataiye agar kuch dikkat aa rahi hai to hum usko theek karte hain wo sab cheezon ka hota hai wo sir ne not satisfied mark kiya tha isliye maine kaha sir kya issue kya aa raha hai service mein koi dikkat aa rahi hai ya aapko koi cheez samajh nahi aayi to hum uske liye dobara se ek bar ek video meet ka training le lete hain sir main to fir service dene ke liye pura ready hun.
Customer: Training do sab ho gaya hum contact bhi kar rahe hain buyleads 100 200 300 type ka aa rahe hai hame 1000 10000 5000 20000 aisa chahiye ya lakh bhi chahiye.
Executive: Achcha. To sir aap apna bulk order wala filter use karo na main. Filter use karna bataya tha aapko kaise use karna hai?
Customer: Wo to hai lekin isme bulk order ka aa nahi raha hai.
Executive: Ek kaam karo na sir ek kaam karte hain main aapka ek video meet arrange karaun aapke account manager se ek video meet aaj karaun ya jab bhi aap free ho.
Customer: Sunday ko kar sakte hain aaj abhi beech mein to time.
Executive: Sunday ko free hain theek hai aap mujhe ek kaam karo main aapko apne number se whatsapp dal deti hun sir aapka secondary number hai na isi number pe aap sunday jab free ho aap ek bar mujhe bol dena otherwise main aapko sunday ko ek video meet schedule kar leti hun aap free account manager Smrita wo aur main rahenge isme theek hai aapko jo bhi doubt hai aap ek bar dobara se puch lo hum dobara se usme kuch kuch cheeze aapki correct kar dete hain koi issue hai to we will discuss about it hai na sir theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Baki main apne hamara ek feedback jo closing ka hai main ticket close kar rahi hun sir usko please yes kar dijiyega wo hamare liye hota hai theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir baki main ek video meet arrange karti hun sunday ko aapko main aapko message.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting enough buyleads.

- Customer gave a negative review prematurely.

- Wants more business before providing positive feedback.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the feedback process.

- Executive offered a video meet to resolve issues.

- Executive will schedule a video meet on Sunday.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send a WhatsApp message.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, feedback, video meet, subscription
